name: Quest helps you keep your life on track by displaying your to-do items (quests) in your notifications
Press the arrow on the left

child.name: This is a subquest. For when you gotta do stuff before you can do other stuff

name: You'll see three buttons on the right side

child.name: The plus sign adds a subquest
The pen edits the current quest
The minus deletes the current quest and all subquests
The big plus button on top adds a new top-level quest
Finally, the three dots on the top right open a menu
The menu lets you open your quests as a JSON file using your favorite editor
Saving that file automatically updates the quest display here
This is useful for larger changes (eg reordering) or for transferring quests

name: You should see a new notification at the top bar. It looks kinda like a Q

child.name: You should see your quests displayed as notifications
You can do everything you do here through the notifications, except creating new quests
This app is open. Check it out, along with my other protects, on my GitHub
